de.zabuza.jumpPokemon

Class Animation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.zabuza.jumpPokemon.Animation

  • public class Animation
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for animations. Calculates the right image out of an Image[] and its hitbox.
    Author:
    Zabuza

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int INFINITY_LOOPS
      Constant for infinity loops.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Animation(Sheet sheet, int row, int thatIntervall)
      Creates an infinity animation over the whole Image[].
      Animation(Sheet sheet, int row, int thatIntervall, int thatLoops)
      Creates an animation with custom loops over the whole Image[].
      Animation(Sheet sheet, int row, int thatIntervall, int thatLoops, int thatStart)
      Creates an animation with custom loops from start to the ending index of the Image[].
      Animation(Sheet sheet, int row, int thatIntervall, int thatLoops, int thatStart, int thatEnd)
      Creates an animation with custom loops from start to end index of the Image[].

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void animate()
      Animates the animation.
      int getHeight()
      Gets the height of the current image.
      Hitbox getHitbox()
      Gets the current hitbox of the animation.
      java.awt.Image getImage()
      Gets the current image of the animation.
      int getWidth()
      Gets the width of the current image.
      boolean isFinished()
      Returns if the animation is finished.

    • Field Detail

      • INFINITY_LOOPS

        public static final int INFINITY_LOOPS
        Constant for infinity loops.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animation

        public Animation(Sheet sheet,
         int row,
         int thatIntervall)
        Creates an infinity animation over the whole Image[].
        Parameters:
        sheet - Sheet which contains the Image[] for usage
        row - Row of the Image[] and Hitbox[] for usage in the sheet
        thatIntervall - Interval between the images of the Image[] in ticks

      • Animation

        public Animation(Sheet sheet,
         int row,
         int thatIntervall,
         int thatLoops)
        Creates an animation with custom loops over the whole Image[].
        Parameters:
        sheet - Sheet which contains the Image[] for usage
        row - Row of the Image[] and Hitbox[] for usage in the sheet
        thatIntervall - Interval between the images of the Image[] in ticks
        thatLoops - Loops over the Image[], 0 for infinity

      • Animation

        public Animation(Sheet sheet,
         int row,
         int thatIntervall,
         int thatLoops,
         int thatStart)
        Creates an animation with custom loops from start to the ending index of the Image[].
        Parameters:
        sheet - Sheet which contains the Image[] for usage
        row - Row of the Image[] and Hitbox[] for usage in the sheet
        thatIntervall - Interval between the images of the Image[] in ticks
        thatLoops - Loops over the Image[], 0 for infinity
        thatStart - Starting index of the Image[] for the animation

      • Animation

        public Animation(Sheet sheet,
         int row,
         int thatIntervall,
         int thatLoops,
         int thatStart,
         int thatEnd)
        Creates an animation with custom loops from start to end index of the Image[].
        Parameters:
        sheet - Sheet which contains the Image[] for usage
        row - Row of the Image[] and Hitbox[] for usage in the sheet
        thatIntervall - Interval between the images of the Image[] in ticks
        thatLoops - Loops over the Image[], 0 for infinity
        thatStart - Starting index of the Image[] for the animation
        thatEnd - Ending index of the Image[] for the animation

    • Method Detail

      • animate

        public final void animate()
        Animates the animation. Calculates the current image and its hitbox of the animation.

        public final boolean isFinished()
        Returns if the animation is finished.
